Claim #1: "Competitors offer better performance and availability."

Pure's Advantage: Pure Cloud Block Store (CBS) provides superior performance and availability compared to competitors. CBS uses RAID-HA, which allows for dual failures of the backend ultra disks, providing higher availability than other solutions. Additionally, CBS leverages high-speed ultra disks for fast write caching and IO coalescing, resulting in a better-performing storage solution.
